name: Dumbbell Bench Press
description: A fundamental upper-body exercise, the dumbbell bench press targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps. Using dumbbells allows for a greater range of motion compared to a barbell.

name: Bent-Over Row
description: This exercise strengthens the back muscles, including the lats and rhomboids, as well as the biceps. It is excellent for improving posture and upper body strength.

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
description: Also known as the overhead press, this exercise is highly effective for developing shoulder strength and size. It also engages the triceps.

name: Farmer's Walk
description: A simple yet highly effective exercise, the farmer's walk involves walking while holding a heavy dumbbell in each hand. It builds grip strength, core stability, and overall endurance.

name: Stiff-Legged Deadlift
description: This exercise, also called the Romanian deadlift, targets the hamstrings, glutes, and lower back.

name: Dumbbell Swing
description: A dynamic, full-body movement that powerfully works the hips, glutes, and hamstrings, while also engaging the shoulders and core.

name: Hammer Curl
description: A variation of the traditional bicep curl, the hammer curl targets both the biceps and the brachialis muscle, helping to build thicker arms.

name: Goblet Squat
description: In this squat variation, you hold a single dumbbell vertically against your chest. It's a great way to learn proper squat form while engaging the quads, glutes, and core.

name: Dumbbell Lunges
description: A classic lower-body exercise that targets the quadriceps, glutes, and hamstrings. Lunges also improve balance and stability.

name: Bicep Curl
description: A classic isolation exercise that targets the biceps. It's a foundational movement for building arm strength and size.
